jwiki.core

Class CAction

  • java.lang.Object
    • jwiki.core.CAction

  • public class CAction
extends Object
    Contains methods to perform concurrent actions on a wiki. Most methods return a set of values indicating whether we were successful or not in performing the requested action(s).
    Author:
    Fastily

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static ArrayList<String> addText(Wiki wiki, boolean append, String add, String reason, ArrayList<String> titles)

    • Method Detail

      • delete

        public static ArrayList<String> delete(Wiki wiki,
                                       String reason,
                                       ArrayList<String> titles)
        Deletes pages. Maximum concurrent threads = 20.
        Parameters:
        wiki - The wiki object to use
        reason - The log summary to use
        titles - The page(s) to delete.
        Returns:
        A list of pages we didn't delete.

      • undelete

        public static ArrayList<String> undelete(Wiki wiki,
                                         boolean agressive,
                                         String reason,
                                         ArrayList<String> titles)
        Undelete pages. Maximum concurrent threads = 5.
        Parameters:
        wiki - The wiki object to use
        agressive - Set to true to attempt restoration 10 times before giving up. MediaWiki isn't very good at restoration.
        reason - The log reason to use
        titles - The page(s) to delete
        Returns:
        A list of pages we didn't delete.

      • addText

        public static ArrayList<String> addText(Wiki wiki,
                                        boolean append,
                                        String add,
                                        String reason,
                                        ArrayList<String> titles)
        Adds text to a file
        Parameters:
        wiki - The wiki object to use
        append - Set to true to append text, set to false to prepend text. Newlines not automatically inserted.
        add - The text to add
        reason - The edit summary to use
        titles - Pages to edit
        Returns:
        A list of titles we couldn't process.

      • replace

        public static ArrayList<String> replace(Wiki wiki,
                                        String replace,
                                        String replacement,
                                        String reason,
                                        ArrayList<String> titles)
        Replaces text on a page.
        Parameters:
        wiki - The wiki object to use
        replace - The text to replace, as a regex.
        replacement - The replacement text for anything matching replace.
        reason - The edit summary to use
        titles - Pages to edit
        Returns:
        A list of titles we couldn't process.

      • edit

        public static ArrayList<String> edit(Wiki wiki,
                                     boolean append,
                                     String reason,
                                     String add,
                                     String replace,
                                     String replacement,
                                     ArrayList<String> titles)
        Edits a title. Allows for both add and/or replacement. Disable add and/or replace with null; you cannot disable both - you will get an error.
        Parameters:
        wiki - The wiki object to use
        append - Set to true to append text, set to false to prepend text. Newlines not automatically inserted. Param is ignored if add is null.
        reason - The edit summary to use
        add - The text to add. Optional param: set to null to disable.
        replace - The text to replace, as a regex. Optional param: set to null to disable
        replacement - The replacement text for anything matching replace. Ignored if replace is null.
        titles - Pages to edit
        Returns:
        A list of titles we couldn't process.
